Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.ResourceStorage

Class PlayerStorage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.ResourceStorage.PlayerStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceStorage
public class PlayerStorage extends Object implements ResourceStorage
Represent the deposit of resources of a player. Contain the list of shelves and the chest

    • move

      public boolean move​(int originId, int destId)
      Move resources from a shelf to another
      Parameters:
      originId - index of the shelf from where to move the resources
      destId - index of the shelf where to place the resources
      Returns:
      true if it was possible to move the resources, false if not

    • store

      public boolean store​(Marble.Color color, int dest)
      Add a resource of the color specified to the shelf with index equal to the one in dest parameter
      Parameters:
      color - color of the resource to add
      dest - index of the shelf where to add the resource
      Returns:
      true if the resource could be added and false if not
